hadiths.text: Amr b. Huraith reported on the authority of his father that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) addressed the people (on the day of the Victory of Mecca) with a black turban on his head

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ دُخُولِ مَكَّةَ بِغَيْرِ إِحْرَامٍ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to enter Makkah without Ihram
